function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Discrepancies in extracted data","Impact":"Inaccurate or inconsistent data analysis and conclusions","Mitigation":"Regular checks and verification of extracted data","Technologies":"Data extraction and verification software","People":"Researchers, principal investigator","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Risk of bias in quality assessment","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of study quality and reliability","Mitigation":"Use of adapted checklist for quality assessment","Technologies":"Quality assessment tools, checklist model","People":"Researchers, principal investigator","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Low quality of evidence in cross-sectional studies","Impact":"Reduced reliability and validity of findings","Mitigation":"Consideration of other high-quality data sources for validation","Technologies":"Cross-sectional study validation tools","People":"Researchers, principal investigator","Owner":"Research team"}]}
